data.description: General considerations of linear wave phenomena; one dimensional waves; two and three dimensional waves; wave equations with constant coefficients; inhomogenous media; random media. Lagrangian and Hamiltonian formulations; asymptotic methods. Knowledge of electromagnetics [such asE C E 320orPHYSICS 321], mechanics [such asM E 340], or vibrations [such asM E 440] strongly encouraged.
data.title: LINEAR WAVES
